content.en: Enhancing mobile localization: Researchers have been exploring ways to improve the accuracy of mobile location estimation in various environments, particularly in the presence of non-line-of-sight (NLOS) errors. They have developed algorithms that take advantage of NLOS propagation paths, mitigate NLOS errors, and enhance accuracy and reliability in mixed line-of-sight (LOS) and NLOS environments. These algorithms, such as the Kalman filter, mean shift-based Kalman filter, and robust localization algorithms, aim to improve wireless communication positioning accuracy and localization accuracy in NLOS environments.
content.da: Forbedring af mobil lokalisering: Forskere har udforsket måder at forbedre nøjagtigheden af mobilens positionsbestemmelse i forskellige miljøer, især i nærvær af non-line-of-sight (NLOS) fejl. De har udviklet algoritmer, der udnytter NLOS udbredelsesstier, reducerer NLOS fejl, og øger nøjagtighed og pålidelighed i blandede line-of-sight (LOS) og NLOS miljøer. Disse algoritmer, såsom Kalman-filteret, mean shift-baseret Kalman-filter og robuste lokaliseringalgoritmer, sigter mod at forbedre nøjagtigheden af trådløs kommunikations positionering og lokalisering i NLOS miljøer.
